access: Members of the Firebrands at the rank of second mark or higher have access to this feat.
markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[You're an Embarrassment!](/Feats.aspx?ID=4137) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Fortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=76" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Firebrands](/Sources.aspx?ID=196) pg. 79</row>

**Archetype** [Celebrity](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=54)

**Prerequisites**
Celebrity Archetype 

**Access**
Members of the Firebrands at the rank of second mark or higher have access to this feat.

**Trigger**
An ally within 30 feet fails a Will saving throw against an [incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93) effect.

</column>

---

Some Firebrands can't stand it when their allies are ruining their moment, and you're no different. Your loud and forceful condemnation of an ally succumbing to an incapacitation effect gives them a second chance to impress you and shake off the effect. Your ally rerolls the triggering Will saving throw with a +1 circumstance bonus. Regardless of the result of the save, your ally is temporarily immune to You're an Embarrassment! for 10 minutes.
name: You're an Embarrassment!
